creator: apache@plouk.net
text:
There is a directive in apache 2.0 which doesn't exist on apache 1.3 :

%...D  	The time taken to serve the request, in microseconds.

Is it possible to implement it in 1.3 ?

Regards

M. Godlewski

The following two links suggest that people have been asking for 
this feature to be backported for a long time:

http://www.mail-archive.com/dev@httpd.apache.org/msg01926.html
http://archive.apache.org/gnats/2838

I am not a developer (I'm not even a programmer in general), so I
don't know why this hasn't been done. The second link above does
have a patch; while it is a patch against an older version of
Apache 1.3, it might still be useful.

-r.
creator: rachel@petta-tech.com
